app.name: AutoPromptOpt
app.description: Prompt Optimization and Template Management Extension

settings.title: Settings
settings.apiKeyHelp: Your key will be securely stored locally
settings.apiProviderHuggingface: Hugging Face - Use Hugging Face Inference API
settings.skipPreviewHelp: When enabled, clicking optimize will directly replace the input content
settings.shortcutKeyHelp: Press the shortcut key to quickly trigger optimization
settings.maxHistoryCountHelp: Set the maximum number of history records to save
settings.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings?

templates.title: Template Management
templates.templateContentPlaceholder: Enter template content, use {content} as placeholder
templates.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this template?
templates.clearAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all templates?
templates.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset to default templates?
templates.noTemplatesDesc: Click 'Add Template' to create your first template

history.title: History
history.clearOldConfirm: Clear records older than how many days?
history.clearAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all history records?
history.noHistoryDesc: Your optimization records will appear here

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Welcome to AutoPromptOpt! Before using this extension, please read the following privacy policy carefully:
points: Your API key is only stored locally in your browser and will not be sent to any third-party servers
Your prompt content is only processed at the API service provider you specify, we do not collect or store your data
Optimization history is only saved locally and you can clear it at any time
This extension does not track your usage behavior or collect any personal information
